text: Paul Gauthier (30 August 1914 in La Flèche – 25 December 2002 in Marseille) catholic theologian and humanist. ==Biography== French theologian and humanist known for his contribution to the liberation theology. == See also == * Liberation theology ==Bibliography== * The Poor, Jesus and the Church (1963) ==References== Category:Catholic theology and doctrine Category:Religion and politics Category:1914 births Category:2002 deaths
title: Paul Gauthier (theologian)
